item.title: Presentation techniques with powerpoint karaoke
item.description: It’s hard to become good at a skill which, for many of us, is only a minor part of our jobs: holding presentations. However, it’s important. Making and delivering a good presentation may take more time for you than making a quick, sloppy presentation, but if it’s bad enough it may be a complete waste of time for your entire audience. So lets go through some tips for how to be on a stage and hold a presentation without letting your nerves get the better of you.
